meter_reading.notes: Odometer wheels show 02271.0. The red needle is positioned at the 4th small tick mark after the 0.03 indication on the dial. Each small tick represents 0.002 m³ (0.01/5). Thus, 0.03 + (4 * 0.002) = 0.038 m³. The '0.00' mark is at the 6 o'clock position (0 degrees for the dial calculation). Each 0.01 increment is 36 degrees. So, 3.8 * 36 = 136.8 degrees.
